Project Title

Caesar Chatbot

Abstract

This is a Julius Caesar Q&A Chatbot. Along with being able to answer common trivia questions about Caesar, it can compensate for spelling-errors and different ways of phrasing a questions.

Currently requires a 3.6 python interpreter to run because tensorflow does not work very well with the latest version of python.

A demo of the chatbot can be found on YouTube .

Technologies

Python, Tensorflow, Deep Learning, Natural Language Processing

Year

2019, 2020

Previous

Protest Locations

 Next

Infrared Light System
